{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SerComm |model=VD625 |revision=(TIM) |series=AC1600 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |est_release_date=05/2016 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id=AUR00B-1.6 |type=CPE,wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168V;BCM63168VKFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L2G81A-25T |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168V;BCM63168VKFEBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S;BCM53124SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=xDSL CPE Line Driver (LD);Broadcom;BCM6303;;1; ,,, 2ch 150V Tracking SLIC;Microsemi;Le9672WQC;;1; ,,, Mixed Signal Microcontroller;TI;MSP430G2513;;1; |flags=VDSL2 |tp_firmware= |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.38-116.118;BCM963268; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.11-rt19; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=B4:A5:EF |oui_eth=B4:A5:EF }} {{TagLine|SerComm AG Combo VD625 Smart Modem TIM}} :[http://www.sercomm.com/contpage.aspx?langid=1&type=prod3&L1id=2&L2id=2&L3id=33&Prodid=97 Product page] "AUR00B-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board in the images. :CPE from '''[[SerComm]]''' sold by '''TIM''' (ex ''Telecom Italia''). Builtin 4x GbE port LAN and 1x GbE WAN port, VDSL2 modem and 2x FXS :The SoC is a [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 and the 5GHz Wi-Fi BCM4360 :It has an 802.11n 2T2R (2.4GHz) Wi-Fi and 802.11ac 3T3R (5GHz) See also [[SerComm]] and [[Huawei HHG2500]].. ===Forum threads=== *[http://smarthome.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2797312 ''Sercomm VD625'' on '''HWUpgrade''' forums] (IT) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=69603 ''Sercomm VD625 Teardown'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] {{SCollapse|Serial Bootlog |

}} ===See also=== *[[SerComm SHG1500]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM6361 ([https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/sercom/shg1500 On '''OpenWrt''' wiki]) :Flash: ''STMicro'' NAND512W3A2DN6 (64MB NAND) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU64M16GG-AC (128MB DDR2-800) *[[SerComm WD300]] (''Wind Home&Life HUB'') - [[Broadcom]] BCM63136V ([https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showpost.php?p=45118181&postcount=1 HWU]) :2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 (A3KMLG) 3T3R 802.11bgn :5GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366E (KMMLW1G) 4T4R 802.11an/ac :1x DSL, 1x WAN (GbE), 4x LAN (GbE), 2x FXS, 1x USB 3.0, 1x SFP :Wi-Fi Cert: WFA79646 (October 12, 2018) :*[[ZyXEL VMG8825-B50B]] • [https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2858661 HWU] :*[[ZyXEL VMG8825-T50K]] • [https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2878681 HWU] *[[ZYXEL VMG8823-B50B]] (2017) - [[Broadcom]] BCM63136V ([https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showpost.php?p=45118181&postcount=1 HWU]) :2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] 2T2R 802.11bgn :5GHz: [[Broadcom]] 4T4R 802.11an/ac :1x DSL, 1x WAN (GbE), 4x LAN (GbE), 2x FXS, 1x USB 3.0 *[[D-Link DVA-5592]] (2018) - [[Broadcom]] BCM63136B0 ([https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showpost.php?p=45118181&postcount=1 HWU]) :2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] 2T2R 802.11bgn :5GHz: [[Broadcom]] 4T4R 802.11an/ac :1x DSL, 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 2x FXS, 2x USB 3.0, 1x SFP *[[D-Link DVA-5582]] (2017) - [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 ([https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showpost.php?p=45118181&postcount=1 HWU]) :2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] 2T2R 802.11bgn :5GHz: [[Broadcom]] 3T3R 802.11an/ac :1x DSL, 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 2x FXS, 2x USB 2.0 *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7490]] (2016) - [[Lantiq]] PSB 80190 ([https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showpost.php?p=45118181&postcount=1 HWU]) :2.4GHz: [[QCA]] QCA9558 3T3R 802.11bgn :5GHz: [[QCA]] QCA9880 3T3R 802.11an/ac :1x DSL, 4x LAN GbE, 2x FXS, 2x USB 3.0, Base DECT ==Images== *http://imgur.com/a/fQ47V __NOTOC__
